faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Have Questions?
faq.description: Here are the most frequently asked questions

whatIsCredits.question: What are article quotas?
whatIsCredits.answer: Article quotas are the subscription unit for 1WaySEO. Each subscription plan includes a fixed monthly article quota. One article includes complete keyword research, competitor analysis, AI content generation, and image generation.

creditsPerArticle.question: How do subscription plans work?
creditsPerArticle.answer: Subscription plans are available in monthly or yearly billing. Each month provides a fixed article quota. Yearly subscribers enjoy 2 extra months of free quota. You can upgrade your plan anytime to get more monthly articles.

creditsAccumulate.question: Do unused monthly quotas accumulate?
creditsAccumulate.answer: Monthly subscription quotas reset at the start of each billing cycle and do not carry over. However, article packages you purchase additionally are permanent and never expire.

getMoreCredits.question: How can I get more articles?
getMoreCredits.answer: You can purchase article add-on packages, which are added directly to your account balance and never expire. If you need more monthly quota, we recommend upgrading to a higher subscription plan.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods are supported?
paymentMethods.answer: We support credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, JCB), online ATM transfers, and other payment methods, securely processed through NewebPay.

item0.name: Michael Chang
item0.content: After implementing 1WaySEO, our blog went from 3 posts per month to 30, and organic search traffic grew by 280%. What used to require a 5-person content team now only needs 1 person to review.

item1.name: Sarah Lee
item1.content: Professional writers used to cost $150 per article. Now with 1WaySEO it's only $3, with even more consistent quality. Saved over $5,000 in content costs in just 6 months!

item2.name: David Wang
item2.content: The auto-scheduling feature is amazing. Once set up, it posts to WordPress daily, giving me more time to focus on strategy. 10 minutes per article - incredible!

item3.name: Emily Chen
item3.content: The AI-generated article structure is incredibly professional, and the internal/external link suggestions are spot-on. We got 5 keywords from page 3 to page 1 - ROI exceeded expectations!

item4.name: Jason Lin
item4.content: Content creation was always the biggest headache when doing SEO for clients. Now I can easily serve 8 clients simultaneously. Highly recommend to all marketers!

item5.name: Jennifer Huang
item5.content: The brand voice settings are so thoughtful - AI-generated articles perfectly match our young, vibrant tone. Auto image generation also saved tons of designer time!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: The Company (1waySEO service provider, hereinafter referred to as "we") appreciates your trust. We take the protection of your personal data very seriously and comply with privacy protection and the relevant provisions of the Personal Data Protection Act. The following is our Privacy and Personal Data Protection Policy (hereinafter referred to as "this Policy"), including what personal data we collect and how we use it, as well as other matters related to your privacy. When you start using 1waySEO services, you acknowledge this Policy and agree to be protected by it.
privacy.section1Title: 1. Personal Data and Other Information We Collect
privacy.section1Content1: When you register as a 1waySEO member, you need to provide a login name and email address. If you register as a 1waySEO member using Google or other websites (hereinafter referred to as "third-party websites"), you agree that we may collect your identity data and other data from your third-party website account, including your name, profile picture, nationality, email address, date of birth, gender, etc. We may need to verify that the data you provide is consistent with the data on that third-party website, and store and use the above data (hereinafter referred to as "personal data") in accordance with this Policy.
privacy.section1Content2: When you sign up for 1waySEO events, depending on the needs of the organizer and the nature of the event, we may require you to provide your name, ID number, date of birth, address, phone number, email address, gender, hobbies or interests, occupation, or other relevant data (hereinafter referred to as "event personal data").
privacy.section1Content3: When you use the 1waySEO website, we may collect:
privacy.section1List1: Your data on 1waySEO, including your usage records, search records, etc.
privacy.section1List2: Technical data, including URL, IP address, browser type, operating system data, language, visit time and location, etc. We may obtain this data through cookies to provide various features on the website. (hereinafter referred to as "usage and technical data")
privacy.section1List3: Data provided by third-party websites. You may authorize us to access your Google Search Console or Google Analytics data when using 1waySEO.
privacy.section1Content4: To provide you with accurate and prompt service, when you use 1waySEO services (such as applying for account changes, providing suggestions, or participating in our marketing activities), you need to provide member account data, personal contact information, or other information.
privacy.section1Content5: We will integrate your usage and technical data, as well as non-personally identifiable information in your personal data. This integrated information, when processed together, will be treated as your personal data.
privacy.section2Content1: We will use the personal data we collect for the following services:
privacy.section2List1: The personal data you provide will be used to identify member identity, contact you, complete transactions, send receipts, notify marketing activities, provide 1waySEO services, or other update notifications related to 1waySEO services.
privacy.section2List2: We will use your personal data to send newsletters and occasional marketing activity notifications.
privacy.section2List3: Your personal data, usage and technical data, and other related data on 1waySEO will be used to improve 1waySEO services, develop new services, and communicate with members, including internal audits, research, analysis, etc.
privacy.section2List4: If you authorize 1waySEO to access your Google Search Console or Google Analytics data, we will use the authorized information to help you analyze your website status.
privacy.section2Content2: We will not use your personal data for purposes not specified in this Policy unless there is an additional need and your written consent is obtained.
privacy.section2Content3: We may share aggregated non-personal data with third parties. "Aggregated non-personal data" refers to data recorded about users and collected in groups, which no longer reflects or can identify specific users.
privacy.section2Content4: The processing and use of the above information may be carried out by our affiliates or other partners, or may occur outside the country. We will not use your personal data or event personal data for other purposes unless local laws stipulate otherwise. We will not disclose your personal data to third parties without your prior consent, unless disclosure is required for significant national interests or to cooperate with law enforcement investigations in accordance with the law.
privacy.section3Title: 3. How You Can Use Your Information
privacy.section3List1: You may query, view, modify, update, or copy your personal data by logging into 1waySEO. If you are not a member or we cannot verify your member identity, you must provide relevant personal data so that we can assist you in querying, viewing, modifying, updating, or copying your personal data and account.
privacy.section3List2: You may request to terminate use or delete your personal data; however, once terminated or deleted, you will no longer be able to use the 1waySEO service on this website.
privacy.section3List3: If your request to modify, update, or delete your personal data may harm significant national interests, impede public agencies from performing their legal duties, or harm significant third-party interests, we have the right to refuse your request.
privacy.section4List1: Your personal data will be stored on our servers. To ensure your privacy, we will take necessary technical measures to protect your personal data, including data encryption transmission (SSL/TLS), secure database storage, regular security audits, etc.
privacy.section4List2: We only store your personal data for the purposes stated above. Therefore, we will delete your personal data when you terminate your use of 1waySEO services.
privacy.section4List3: Please keep your personal data and event personal data safe. After using our online services on personal, others', or public computers/electronic devices, please log out or close the software and browser windows when necessary to prevent your personal data and event personal data from being stolen.
privacy.section4List4: Please keep your payment information (including credit card data) safe and do not disclose it to others.
privacy.section4List5: 1waySEO may contain links and windows to other websites or pages that are not ours. If you provide your personal data to those websites, we are not responsible.
privacy.section4List6: You agree that the data you use when making purchases on 1waySEO-related websites is accurate. If you subsequently discover that your personal data has been illegally used by others or there is any abnormality, you should notify us immediately.
privacy.section4List7: You agree that when using 1waySEO services, the data you provide and use is legal and does not infringe on third-party rights, violate third-party agreements, or involve any illegal acts. If the use of 1waySEO services causes damage to third parties, we are not liable for related compensation unless we are intentional or grossly negligent.
privacy.section5Content: We use the following third-party services:
privacy.section5List5: Google Search Console / Google Analytics - Website data analysis (requires user authorization)
privacy.section6Content: 1waySEO uses Google API services to help you analyze your website's performance in Google search results. The following is a detailed description of how we use these services:
privacy.section6_1Content: When you authorize connection to Google Search Console, we will access the following data:
privacy.section6_1List1: Impressions and clicks of your website in Google search results
privacy.section6_1List2: Ranking positions and click-through rates (CTR) for search keywords
privacy.section6_1List3: Search performance data for website pages
privacy.section6_2List1: Display your website search performance summary in the 1waySEO dashboard
privacy.section6_2List2: Help you understand which keywords bring traffic to your website
privacy.section6_2Content: We will not use your Google Search Console data for advertising, resale to third parties, or any purpose unrelated to providing 1waySEO services.
privacy.section6_3List1: Your Google OAuth authorization credentials are stored encrypted on our secure servers
privacy.section6_3List2: Search performance data is cached for up to 6 hours to improve loading speed
privacy.section6_3List3: When you revoke authorization or delete your account, all related data will be permanently deleted
privacy.section6_4Content: You can revoke 1waySEO's access to your Google account at any time:
privacy.section6_4List1: Click the "Disconnect" button on the 1waySEO website details page
privacy.section6_4List2: Or go to Google Account Permissions Settings to remove 1waySEO's access
privacy.section6_4Content2: After revoking authorization, we will no longer be able to access your Google Search Console data and will delete the stored related data.
privacy.section6_5Content: 1waySEO's use of Google API complies with the Google API Terms of Service.
privacy.section7List5: Provide various features on the website
privacy.section8Title: 8. Revision and Effectiveness of Privacy and Personal Data Protection Policy
privacy.section8List1: We will update this Policy from time to time and comply with local privacy and personal data protection laws. When we make significant changes, we will announce them on our official website.
privacy.section8List2: This Privacy and Personal Data Protection Policy forms part of the 1waySEO Terms of Service. If you disagree with any terms of this Policy or any modifications or changes, please stop using 1waySEO services immediately.
privacy.section9Content: If you have any questions about our privacy or personal data protection policy, please contact:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Content: 1waySEO services are provided by the Company in accordance with these Terms (hereinafter referred to as "the Service"). When you use 1waySEO, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to accept all the contents of these Terms. If you are under eighteen years of age, you may only use the services provided by 1waySEO after your parent (or guardian) has read, understood, and agreed that you will comply with all the contents of these Terms.
terms.section1List1: You must agree to these Terms before using the Service. If you do not accept these Terms, you may not use the Service.
terms.section1List2: You understand and agree that when using the Service, you may express your intent through "electronic documents," for example, when you click on consent or confirmation buttons on various service and function pages, it is considered your formal expression of intent.
terms.section1List3: The Company may modify or change the contents of these Terms due to adjustments in service content and changes in relevant laws and regulations. Please review these Terms of Service at any time. If you continue to use 1waySEO after any modification or change, you or your parent (or guardian) are deemed to have read, understood, and agreed to accept the modified or changed Terms of Service.
terms.section2Title: 2. General Terms of Rights and Obligations
terms.section2_1Content: The "1waySEO" service is provided by the Company to improve your search ranking on search engines, offering services such as "AI-driven content generation," "SEO optimization suggestions," "keyword strategy analysis," and "website content optimization."
terms.section2_2List1: When applying to become a member, you should provide accurate personal data. To obtain certain related services of this Service, the Company may require you to provide relevant personal information (such as identity or contact information). To ensure the service registration process or continued use of the Service, please update your personal data at any time if there are changes. If the personal data you provide is found to be false or inconsistent with current circumstances after verification by the Company, the Company reserves the right to suspend or terminate your use of the Service at any time.
terms.section2_2List2: The user account and password for this Service are set by you. After setting, you have the obligation to properly manage and keep them confidential. The Company will authenticate your identity using the user account and password you set, and you must be responsible for all actions taken through this user account and password.
terms.section2_2List3: To protect your rights, please do not provide your account and password to others. If any loss is caused by your providing your account and password to others, the Company will not bear related responsibility. If you discover that your username and password may have been stolen by others, please notify the Company immediately.
terms.section2_2List4: The Company complies with the 1waySEO Privacy and Personal Data Protection Policy and keeps member data confidential or performs related access, use, storage, or disclosure in accordance with relevant laws and regulations. For details, please read the Company's Privacy and Personal Data Protection Policy. This policy also forms part of these Terms of Service.
terms.section2_3Content: Members or unregistered users should comply with current laws when using the Service. You agree and guarantee that you will not use the Service to engage in activities that infringe on the rights of others or engage in illegal acts. If you have any of the following circumstances, and it is verified to be true, the Company may stop providing services to you:
terms.section2_3List1: Infringing on others' reputation, privacy, trade secrets, trademarks, copyrights, patents, other intellectual property rights, and other rights.
terms.section2_3List2: Violating confidentiality obligations required by law or contract.
terms.section2_3List3: Using this Service under another person's name.
terms.section2_3List5: Not engaging in any activities that interfere with or destroy the Service (or servers and networks connected to the Service).
terms.section2_3List6: Other conduct that the Company has legitimate reasons to consider inappropriate.
terms.section3List1: Subscriptions are billed monthly or annually, or with a lifetime plan.
terms.section3List2: Monthly and annual plans will automatically renew unless cancelled.
terms.section3List3: You may cancel your subscription at any time, but fees already paid will not be refunded.
terms.section3List4: Prices may be adjusted, and users will be notified in advance.
terms.section3List5: Payment information is processed by third-party payment service providers (such as NewebPay), and the Company does not store complete payment information.
terms.section4List1: Content generated by users belongs to the users.
terms.section4List2: 1waySEO retains ownership of the platform and services.
terms.section4List3: AI-generated content can be freely used by users, but users need to review and edit the generated content themselves.
terms.section4List4: Users must ensure that content produced using this Service does not infringe on others' intellectual property rights.
terms.section5List1: Monthly content generation quota depends on the subscription plan.
terms.section5List4: Commercial resale of services is prohibited.
terms.section5Content2: The Company reserves the right to:
terms.section5List6: Suspend or terminate accounts that violate the terms.
terms.section5List9: Does not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service.
terms.section5List10: Is not responsible for indirect losses.
terms.section5List11: Is not responsible for the accuracy of AI-generated content.
terms.section5List12: Users need to review and edit generated content themselves.
terms.section6Content: Users may terminate their account at any time. The Company reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts under the following circumstances:
terms.section7_1List1: If any part of these Terms is deemed invalid in whole or in part, it does not affect the validity of other provisions.
terms.section7_1List2: The contents of this contract have been reviewed and agreed upon by you. If you disagree with any part of these Terms, please do not use the Service.
terms.section7_2Content: The interpretation and application of these Terms of Service, and disputes related to these Terms of Service, shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of China (Taiwan), and the Taipei District Court of Taiwan shall be the court of first instance with exclusive agreed jurisdiction.
terms.section8Content: If you have any questions about the Terms of Service, please contact:

externalWebsites.pageDescription: Manage external projects that need article sync (via Webhook integration)
externalWebsites.listDescription: Articles will be automatically synced to enabled external websites via Webhook after publishing
externalWebsites.confirmRegenerateSecret: Are you sure you want to regenerate the Webhook Secret? The old Secret will be invalidated immediately.
externalWebsites.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
externalWebsites.noPermission: You do not have permission to perform this action
externalWebsites.websiteInfoDescription: Set website name and Webhook URL
externalWebsites.slugHint: Slug cannot be changed after creation
externalWebsites.webhookUrlHint: POST requests will be sent to this URL when articles are published

createDialog.title: Add External Website
createDialog.description: Configure external project for article sync via Webhook
createDialog.name: Name
createDialog.slugHint: Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens allowed

secretDialog.title: Webhook Secret
secretDialog.description: Please save this Secret securely. It will not be shown again after closing.
secretDialog.envHint: Set environment variable in external project:

externalWebsites.syncSettingsDescription: Configure when to sync articles to this external website via Webhook

syncSettings.syncOnPublishDesc: Automatically sync when article is published
syncSettings.syncOnUpdateDesc: Automatically sync changes when article is updated
syncSettings.syncOnUnpublishDesc: Notify this website when article is unpublished
syncSettings.syncTranslationsDesc: Also sync translated versions of articles

externalWebsites.articleGenerationSettingsDescription: Configure default topics, target region and language for this website. These settings will be automatically applied when writing articles.
externalWebsites.brandVoiceDescription: Configure brand style and tone for articles on this website
externalWebsites.brandNameHint: This brand name will be appropriately mentioned in articles
externalWebsites.targetAudiencePlaceholder: e.g., B2B professionals, consumers, technical staff
externalWebsites.targetAudienceHint: Describe your target readers, article style will adjust based on audience
externalWebsites.autoScheduleDescription: Configure auto-scheduling behavior after article generation. When enabled, articles will be automatically queued for publishing.
externalWebsites.autoScheduleHint: Automatically queue articles for publishing after generation
externalWebsites.intervalHint: Publish 1 article every specified number of days

translations.title: Translation Management
translations.description: Translate published articles into multiple languages to expand international SEO coverage
translations.autoTranslateDescription: When enabled, translation tasks will be triggered automatically when articles are scheduled for publishing
translations.targetLanguageDescription: Select languages to translate to ({count} selected)
translations.articleListDescription: Select articles to translate ({count} total articles)
translations.betaAccessDeniedDescription: This feature is only available to selected accounts. Please contact support to request access.
translations.selectAtLeastOneArticle: Please select at least one article
translations.selectAtLeastOneLanguage: Please select at least one target language
translations.allSkipped: All selected articles already have translations for the selected languages, skipped {count}
translations.createdWithSkipped: Created {created} translation jobs, skipped {skipped} existing translations
translations.created: Created {count} translation jobs, processing will start within 5 minutes
translations.accessDeniedToast: Translation feature is in Beta and only available to selected accounts

emptyState.all: No published articles available for translation

paymentTest.title: PAYUNi Payment Test
paymentTest.description: Production environment payment test (real transactions will be created, use small amounts)
paymentTest.warningMessage: This is a production environment test and will create real transactions. Please confirm the amount before proceeding.
paymentTest.paymentTestFailed: Payment test failed, please check console

refunds.title: Refund Review Management
refunds.approveDialogDescription: Are you sure you want to approve this refund request? The refund will be processed automatically after approval.
refunds.rejectDialogDescription: Please provide a reason for rejecting this refund request.
refunds.accessDenied: You do not have permission to access this page

promoCodes.title: Promo Code Management
promoCodes.createDialogDescription: Create a new promo code with bonus articles per month
promoCodes.confirmDeactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate promo code "{code}"?
promoCodes.loadFailed: Failed to load promo code list

subscriptions.title: Subscription Management
subscriptions.description: View and manage all member subscriptions

cookies.settingsDescription: Choose which cookies you allow us to use. You can change these settings at any time.
cookies.necessaryDescription: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled. Includes login authentication, security features, etc.
cookies.analyticsDescription: Used to understand how visitors use our website, helping us improve service quality. Includes Google Analytics and other analytics tools.
cookies.marketingDescription: Used to track cross-site browsing behavior to provide more relevant advertising content.
cookies.privacyInfo: For more information about how we use cookies, please see our

authorizing.pleaseWait: Please wait, do not close this page
authorizing.connectionTimeout: Connection to payment service timed out, please try again
authorizing.submitFailed: Submission failed, please check your browser settings

freePlan.title: Upgrade to Unlock Website Connection
freePlan.description: Free plan only supports article generation. Upgrade to a paid plan to connect WordPress websites
freePlan.starterFeatures: Upgrade to STARTER plan to get:

general.title: Access Denied
general.description: You do not have permission to view this page
general.contactAdmin: If you believe this is an error, please contact your administrator to obtain the necessary permissions.
